price: Se susurrarán unos a otros, y algunos dirán: "Solo permanecimos [en la vida mundanal] diez días".
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
